name: Mimic
description: (Teaser) Be in 2 or more places at the same time.
statusReason: Project is planned for future development.

name: Ignis
description: A prototyping language for quick and cheap process simulation on the spot.
statusReason: Project is planned for future development.

name: Chronos
description: A tool to mass-edit, orchestrate and parse calendar events.

name: Scratchpost
description: A tool to facilitate extracting slice data from Prusa Slicer.

name: Calmiq
description: An IoT device capable of measuring a person's approximate stress levels.

name: Botzilla
description: A robot for the FRC 2025 season, made in collaboration with 6 other teammates

name: Robot in 3 Days
description: A robot for the FRC 2025 season made in 3 days. The code for this entry is not complete

name: Playbot Carti - Acoustic Version
description: A complete rewrite of Playbot Carti with improved performance. Written by myself.

name: Playbot Carti
description: A robot made to participate in the 2024 FRC season "Crescendo". Written by myself.

name: Elbot John, I think?
description: A robot made to participate in the 2023 FRC season "Charged Up". Written alongside two mentors.

name: Nox
description: An prototype programming language aimed at solving complex problems with as little code as possible.
statusReason: Nox has a new successor named Ignis.

name: timelib
description: A custom C++ library to handle precise time calculations for robotics applications.
statusReason: Project discontinued, no archived copies available.

name: Arsenal
description: A more serious Minecraft mod that added long range weapons to the game using vector math.
statusReason: Project discontinued, no archived copies available.

name: Pigstones
description: A silly Minecraft mod that served as my introduction to programming.
statusReason: Project discontinued, no archived copies available.
